EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1311864741.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE William,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few items we spoke about
1. Expense policy 2. Expense list (most common types of expenses you can submit through us) 3. Link to our group benefit plan details: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits 4. Estimate showing you what your income would look like running through MBO 5. Summary of benefits
I’ll follow up with you next week. I’ll have my fingers crossed for you and MBO on this contract J
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
